events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of April 30th involving their vehicle and another on the highway.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under auto accident as the incident involved a vehicle collision with property damage.
An insurance agent was assigned to the claim to manage communications and gather additional information from the customer.
The customer received official acknowledgement of their claim submission along with an estimated timeline for investigation.
The agent requested necessary documents including police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and proof of insurance.
All required documents have been submitted by the customer, including the accident report and detailed pictures of the damaged car.
The investigation team began reviewing evidence and assessing the extent of damage and liability based on submitted documents.
Investigation concluded with verification of the claim details and confirmation that the other party was at fault for the car accident.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair costs for their vehicle and other associated losses.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the prompt handling of their auto accident claim.
The claim was officially approved by the insurer following acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer.
Payment corresponding to the settlement amount has been issued to the customerâ€™s account for vehicle repairs.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after payment was completed and no further actions were required.
The case files and documents for this auto claim have been archived in compliance with internal record-keeping policies.
